description:
Just before the end of the third quarter, Seirin sends in Kuroko as their trump card. Kuroko blazes past Midorima and Takao with his new Vanishing Drive technique, scoring point after point and bringing the game to a tie.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il y a un moment que je les ai dépassées
Tou no Mukashi ni Koete Iru
とうの昔に超えている
